Protocols/KeyboardAdjuster.html#/s:16Key.name: activateKeyboardAdjuster()
Protocols/KeyboardAdjuster.html#/s:16Key.abstract: Activates keyboard adjustment for the calling view controller.

Protocols/KeyboardAdjuster.html#/s:16Key.name: activateKeyboardAdjuster(_:hideBlock:)
Protocols/KeyboardAdjuster.html#/s:16Key.abstract: Enable keyboard adjustment for the current view controller, providing optional closures to call when the keyboard appears and when it disappears.

Protocols/KeyboardAdjuster.html#/s:16Key.name: deactivateKeyboardAdjuster()
Protocols/KeyboardAdjuster.html#/s:16Key.abstract: Call this in your viewWillDisappear method for your UIViewController. This method removes any active keyboard observers from your view controller.
